Class SWActorWorldable

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.monash.fit2099.simulator.matter.Entity
      • edu.monash.fit2099.simulator.matter.Actor<SWActionInterface>
        • starwars.SWActor
          • starwars.SWActorWorldable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EntityInterface, SWEntityInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Sandcrawler

    public abstract class SWActorWorldable
extends SWActor
    A new Class that attached to SWActor that has SWInnerWorld. and to reduce workload of SWActor and also make classification more explicit.
    Author:
    wen
